title: Silver 2 (Gold Last Season) Support LF Team or Duo
body:
I am interested in joining a team or just climbing with somebody. I am a Support main (currently Silver 2, in promos for Silver 1) and can play any support. I have discord, don't tilt very easily and am willing to learn as I play. I leave a link to my OP.GG below as well as my Mastery points on champions so you may see who I play. I am in high school so I may be busy at times but I am on if not at school or doing homework, as well as I live in NZ so I would need times that work around that. 

Thanks for considering,
DramaticChicken

OP.GG: https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=DramaticChicken
Champion Mastery Points: https://championmasterylookup.derpthemeus.com/summoner?summoner=DramaticChicken&region=OCE

replies.body:
Add me: whosupsmewin
Friendly player:)
Main AD
